charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to import marihuana from Mexico into Arizona, conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute marihuana, and conspiracy to commit money laundering, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 963 and 846, and Title 18, United States Code, Section 1956(h).

Conspiracy to import marihuana from Mexico into Arizona, conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute marihuana, and conspiracy to commit money laundering, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 963 and 846, and Title 18, United States Code, Section 1956(h).
